Ponsonby Rd shooter was son of celebrated New Zealand film-maker Don Selwyn https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-rd-shooter-was-son-of-celeberated-new-zealand-filmmaker-don-selwyn/NX3Z6IBWX5ALJNYYIQTHWKNSFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/ponsonby-rd-shooter-was-son-of-celeberated-new-zealand-filmmaker-don-selwyn/NX3Z6IBWX5ALJNYYIQTHWKNSFY/ The gunman was Hone Kay-Selwyn.
